verses.verse: Open<WH6605> your doors,<WH1817> O Lebanon,<WH3844> that the fire<WH784> may devour<WH398> your cedars.<WH730>

Howl,<WH3213> fir<WH1265> tree; for the cedar<WH730> is fallen;<WH5307> because<WH834> the mighty<WH117> are spoiled:<WH7703> howl,<WH3213> O you oaks<WH437> of Bashan;<WH1316> for the forest<WH3293> of the vintage<WH1208> is come<WH3381> down.<WH3381>

There is a voice<WH6963> of the howling<WH3213> of the shepherds;<WH7462> for their glory<WH155> is spoiled:<WH7703> a voice<WH6963> of the roaring<WH7581> of young<WH3715> lions;<WH3715> for the pride<WH1347> of Jordan<WH3383> is spoiled.<WH7703>
Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> my God;<WH430> Feed<WH7462> the flock<WH6629> of the slaughter;<WH2028>

Whose<WH834> possessors<WH7069> slay<WH2026> them, and hold<WH816> themselves not guilty:<WH816> and they that sell<WH4376> them say,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD;<WH3068> for I am rich:<WH6238> and their own shepherds<WH7462> pity<WH2550> them not.

For I will no<WH3808> more<WH5750> pity<WH2550> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> said<WH5002> the LORD:<WH3068> but, see, I will deliver<WH4672> the men<WH120> every<WH376> one<WH376> into his neighbor's<WH7453> hand,<WH3027> and into the hand<WH3027> of his king:<WH4428> and they shall smite<WH3807> the land,<WH776> and out of their hand<WH3027> I will not deliver<WH5337> them.

And I will feed<WH7462> the flock<WH6629> of slaughter,<WH2028> even<WH3651> you, O poor<WH6041> of the flock.<WH6629> And I took<WH3947> to me two<WH8147> staves;<WH4731> the one<WH259> I called<WH7121> Beauty,<WH5278> and the other<WH259> I called<WH7121> Bands;<WH2256> and I fed<WH7462> the flock.<WH6629>
Three<WH7969> shepherds<WH7462> also I cut<WH3582> off in one<WH259> month;<WH3391> and my soul<WH5315> loathed<WH7114> them, and their soul<WH5315> also<WH1571> abhorred<WH973> me.

Then said<WH559> I, I will not feed<WH7462> you: that that dies,<WH4191> let it die;<WH4191> and that that is to be cut<WH3582> off, let it be cut<WH3582> off; and let the rest<WH7604> eat<WH398> every<WH802> one<WH802> the flesh<WH1320> of another.<WH7468>

And I took<WH3947> my staff,<WH4731> even<WH853> Beauty,<WH5278> and cut<WH1438> it asunder, that I might break<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> which<WH834> I had made<WH3772> with all<WH3605> the people.<WH5971>
And it was broken<WH6565> in that day:<WH3117> and so<WH3651> the poor<WH6041> of the flock<WH6629> that waited<WH8104> on me knew<WH3045> that it was the word<WH1697> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And I said<WH559> to them, If<WH518> you think<WH5869> good,<WH2896> give<WH3051> me my price;<WH7939> and if<WH518> not, forbear.<WH2308> So they weighed<WH8254> for my price<WH7939> thirty<WH7970> pieces of silver.<WH3701>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Cast<WH7993> it to the potter:<WH3335> a goodly<WH145> price<WH3365> that I was priced<WH3365> at of them. And I took<WH3947> the thirty<WH7970> pieces of silver,<WH3701> and cast<WH7993> them to the potter<WH3335> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD.<WH3068>
Then I cut<WH1438> asunder my other<WH8145> staff,<WH4731> even<WH853> Bands,<WH2256> that I might break<WH6565> the brotherhood<WH264> between<WH996> Judah<WH3063> and Israel.<WH3478>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Take<WH3947> to you yet<WH5750> the instruments<WH3627> of a foolish<WH196> shepherd.<WH7462>

For, see, I will raise<WH6965> up a shepherd<WH7462> in the land,<WH776> which shall not visit<WH6485> those that be cut<WH3582> off, neither<WH3808> shall seek<WH1245> the young<WH5288> one, nor<WH3808> heal<WH7495> that that is broken,<WH7665> nor<WH3808> feed<WH3557> that that stands<WH5324> still: but he shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the fat,<WH1277> and tear<WH6561> their claws<WH6541> in pieces.

Woe<WH1945> to the idol<WH457> shepherd<WH7473> that leaves<WH5800> the flock!<WH6629> the sword<WH2719> shall be on his arm,<WH2220> and on his right<WH3225> eye:<WH5869> his arm<WH2220> shall be clean<WH2889> dried<WH3001> up, and his right<WH3225> eye<WH5869> shall be utterly darkened.<WH3543>
